verses.text: \w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* when thou \w goest|strong="H3212"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and be more \w ready|strong="H7138"\w* to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, than to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of \w fools|strong="H3684"\w*: for they \w consider|strong="H3045"\w* not that they \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

Be not \w rash|strong="H0926"\w* with thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and let not thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* be \w hasty|strong="H4116"\w* to \w utter|strong="H3318"\w* \add any\add* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and thou upon \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: therefore let thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w* be \w few|strong="H4592"\w*.\f + \fr 5.2 \ft thing: or, word\f*

For a \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* through the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of \w business|strong="H6045"\w*; and a \w fool’s|strong="H3684"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \add is known\add* by \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

When thou \w vowest|strong="H5087"\w* a \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w defer|strong="H0309"\w* not to \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* it; for \add he hath\add* no \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w* in \w fools|strong="H3684"\w*: \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* that which thou hast \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w*.
\w Better|strong="H2896"\w* \add is it\add* that thou shouldest not \w vow|strong="H5087"\w*, than that thou shouldest \w vow|strong="H5087"\w* and not \w pay|strong="H7999"\w*.

\w Suffer|strong="H5414"\w* not thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* to cause thy \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*; neither \w say|strong="H0559"\w* thou \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w*, that it \add was\add* an \w error|strong="H7684"\w*: wherefore should \w God|strong="H0430"\w* be \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* at thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w destroy|strong="H2254"\w* the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of thine \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*?

For in the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w* and \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \add there are\add* also \add divers\add* \w vanities|strong="H1892"\w*: but \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thou \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ If thou \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* the \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H7326"\w*, and \w violent|strong="H1499"\w* perverting of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* and \w justice|strong="H6664"\w* in a \w province|strong="H4082"\w*, \w marvel|strong="H8539"\w* not at the \w matter|strong="H2656"\w*: for \add he that is\add* \w higher|strong="H1364"\w* than the \w highest|strong="H1364"\w* \w regardeth|strong="H8104"\w*; and \add there be\add* \w higher|strong="H1364"\w* than \w they|strong="H5921"\w*.\f + \fr 5.8 \ft at the…: Heb. at the will, or, purpose\f*

¶ Moreover the \w profit|strong="H3504"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* is for all: the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \add himself\add* is \w served|strong="H5647"\w* by the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

He that \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* shall not be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* with \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; nor he that \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* \w abundance|strong="H1995"\w* with \w increase|strong="H8393"\w*: this \add is\add* also \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*.

When \w goods|strong="H2896"\w* \w increase|strong="H7235"\w*, they are \w increased|strong="H7231"\w* that \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* them: and what \w good|strong="H3788"\w* \add is there\add* to the \w owners|strong="H1167"\w* thereof, \w saving|strong="H0518"\w* the \w beholding|strong="H7207"\w* \add of them\add* with their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*?

The \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* of a labouring \w man|strong="H5647"\w* \add is\add* \w sweet|strong="H4966"\w*, whether he \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* or \w much|strong="H7235"\w*: but the \w abundance|strong="H7647"\w* of the \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* will not \w suffer|strong="H3240"\w* him to \w sleep|strong="H3462"\w*.

There \w is|strong="H3426"\w* a \w sore|strong="H2470"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \add which\add* I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* under the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, \add namely\add*, \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* for the \w owners|strong="H1167"\w* thereof to their \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*.

But those \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* by \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w travail|strong="H6045"\w*: and he \w begetteth|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \add there is\add* \w nothing|strong="H3972"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

As he came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* of his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*, \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* shall he \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* as he \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, and shall \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3972"\w* of his \w labour|strong="H5999"\w*, which he may carry \w away|strong="H3212"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And \w this|strong="H2090"\w* also \add is\add* a \w sore|strong="H2470"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \add that\add* in all \w points|strong="H5980"\w* as he \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, so shall he \w go|strong="H3212"\w*: and what \w profit|strong="H3504"\w* hath he that hath \w laboured|strong="H5998"\w* for the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*?

All his \w days|strong="H3117"\w* also he \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* in \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, and \add he hath\add* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H3707"\w* and \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* with his \w sickness|strong="H2483"\w*.

¶ Behold \add that\add* which I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*: \add it is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* and \w comely|strong="H3303"\w* \add for one\add* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, and to \w enjoy|strong="H7200"\w* the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* of all his \w labour|strong="H5999"\w* that he \w taketh|strong="H5998"\w* under the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w all|strong="H4557"\w* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, which \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* him: for it \add is\add* his \w portion|strong="H2506"\w*.\f + \fr 5.18 \ft it is good…: Heb. there is a good which is comely, etc\f*\f + \fr 5.18 \ft all the days: Heb. the number of the days\f*

Every \w man|strong="H0120"\w* also to whom \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* and \w wealth|strong="H5233"\w*, and hath given him \w power|strong="H7980"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof, and to \w take|strong="H5375"\w* his \w portion|strong="H2506"\w*, and to \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in his \w labour|strong="H5999"\w*; \w this|strong="H2090"\w* \add is\add* the \w gift|strong="H4991"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

For he shall not \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w life|strong="H2416"\w*; because \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w answereth|strong="H6031"\w* \add him\add* in the \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* of his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.\f + \fr 5.20 \ft For…: or, Though he give not much, yet he remembereth, etc\f*
